entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
